tokencover.name: Alt. Token Cover
tokencover.cover-effect.can-overlap.Name: 上乗せ可能
tokencover.cover-effect.priority.Name: 優先度
tokencover.cover-effect.priority.Hint: 優先度が大きいほど先にテストされます。「0」に設定して無視します。
tokencover.cover-effect.live-tokens-bloc: 生存中のコマ ブロック
tokencover.cover-effect.dead-tokens-bloc: 死亡したコマ ブロック
コマのhpを決定する能力値を編集したい場合はMOD設定をご覧ください。
tokencover.cover-effect.prone-tokens-blo: 伏せ状態のコマ ブロック
有効化すると、伏せ状態のコマは遮蔽を与えます（based on their height as multiplied by the prone multiplier. If neither dead nor live tokens grant cover, this does nothing. See module settings for the prone multiplier.
tokencover.settings.combatant: 現在の戦闘参加者のみ
tokencover.settings.cover-workflow-confi: ユーザに確認（キャンセルのみ）
tokencover.settings.use-cover-types.Name: 遮蔽アイコン表示
tokencover.settings.use-cover-types.Hint: When enabled, icons representing cover types will be displayed locally (per user) on tokens to indicate if they have cover from controlled tokens. If multiple tokens selected, cover will be the minimum from the group. This cover display does not account for some system-specific features that might ignore cover (such as ignoring cover for only certain attack types).
tokencover.settings.cover-types-targetin: Apply Cover Icons Only When Targeting
If enabled, cover icons will be displayed only for targeted tokens. Otherwise, cover icons will be displayed for all non-controlled tokens. Only applicable when 'Display Cover Types' is enabled.
tokencover.settings.use-cover-effects.Hi: Apply cover effects (active effects or system equivalent) to tokens locally. For dnd5e, the confirm cover settings below may later modify the effects actually applied during an attack.
tokencover.settings.cover-effects-target: ターゲット中のみ遮蔽効果付与
If enabled, cover effects will be applied only to targeted tokens. Otherwise, cover types will be applied to all non-controlled tokens. Only applicable when 'Apply Cover Effects' is enabled.
tokencover.settings.display-cover-book.H: If enabled, adds a book icon to the GM's token controls that allows the GM to customize cover types and cover effects. GM can also drag cover effects to a token to override automatic cover.
tokencover.settings.display-secret-cover: 秘匿コマに遮蔽を表示
Toggle whether cover icons should be displayed on tokens with secret disposition.
tokencover.settings.only-cover-icons.Nam: 遮蔽アイコンのみ使う
tokencover.settings.only-cover-icons.Hin: When enabled, only cover icons will be displayed; no cover effects will be used. If you system is unsupported, try enabling this.
tokencover.settings.cover-chat-message.H: When rolling an attack, display cover types for targets in the chat.
tokencover.settings.cover-workflow-confi: When an attack is made, should a dialog be presented to allow the user to confirm the cover calculation? This affects the underlying cover calculation. It also will affect Cover Types or Cover Effects, if these settings are enabled.
The confirmation dialog, if enabled, will only be presented if the cover type or effect(s) differ on the token than what has been calculated.
When enabled, the confirmation will be presented when the cover calculation estimates the token has no cover.
tokencover.settings.points-center: コマの中心点のみ（1ポイント）
tokencover.settings.points-two: コマの正面2隅（2ポイント）
tokencover.settings.points-three: コマの正面2隅と中心点（3ポイント）
tokencover.settings.points-five: コマの4隅と中心点（5ポイント）
tokencover.settings.points-nine: Token midpoints, corners, center（9ポイント）
tokencover.settings.los-algorithm.Name: アルゴリズム
tokencover.settings.los-algorithm.Hint: How to test whether a target token has cover with respect to a viewing token.
tokencover.settings.los-large-target.Hin: If the target token is larger than the grid square, test each grid square under the token separately for cover. Least cover wins. Useful for large targets that should not have cover if the viewer has line-of-sight to a substantial portion of the target. When using the points algorithm, this generally follows the dnd5e DMG cover rule for grid squares.
tokencover.settings.los-points-viewer.Hi: How many points on the viewer to test for line-of-sight to the target. Each viewer point is considered independently; least cover wins. Beware that this can dramatically increase the number of tests needed to determine cover.
tokencover.settings.los-inset-viewer.Hin: For viewer points other than the center, what percentage to inset the point from the token border towards the token center.
tokencover.settings.los-points-target.Hi: How many points on the target to test for cover from the viewer's line-of-sight.
tokencover.settings.los-inset-target.Hin: For target points other than the center, what percentage to inset the point from the token border towards the token center.
tokencover.settings.los-points-3d.Name: 3d points
tokencover.settings.los-points-3d.Hint: Test the top and bottom of the target token in addition to the points in the middle of the token vertically.
tokencover.settings.debug-cover.Name: 遮蔽デバッグ
tokencover.settings.debug-cover.Hint: If enabled, will draw representation on the canvas of the cover between viewer and target(s). If Area3d is enabled, you must target a single token to make the debug window appear.
tokencover.settings.button-dnd5e-dmg.Not: D&D 5eに設定が変更されました
tokencover.settings.prone-status-id.Name: 「伏せ状態」 Id
tokencover.settings.prone-status-id.Hint: String indicating the id for the token 'prone' status. If set, prone tokens will be considered half-height for all vision and cover calculations.
tokencover.settings.token-hp-attribute.H: String indicating where the hit points for a `token.actor` can be found. Required to use dead tokens for cover.
tokencover.settings.prone-multiplier.Hin: What percentage of token height should be used for prone tokens. For example, if a token is 5 feet high, and the multiplier is set to 0.6, prone tokens would be considered 3 feet high. This affects the vision point for prone tokens as well as the shape used if prone tokens block vision.
tokencover.settings.vision-height-multip: 視界はトークンの何パーセントの高さに位置していますか？0%で一番下になります。100% (1)は一番上を意味します。
tokencover.settings.atv-settings-message: When Alternative Token Visibility is active, the prone multiplier, vision height multiplier, prone status id, and token HP id use ATV's settings.
tokencover.settings.button-pf2e.Label: PF2eにリセット
tokencover.settings.button-pf2e.Notifica: Alt. Cover設定はPF2eの既定に変更されました
tokencover.settings.button-dnd5e.Label: DND5e DMGにリセット
tokencover.settings.button-dnd5e.Notific: Alt. Cover設定はD&D 5e DMG（ダンジョン・マスターズ・ガイド）の既定に変更されました
tokencover.settings.button-threeD.Label: 3-Dにリセット
tokencover.settings.button-threeD.Notifi: Alt. Cover設定は3Dの既定に変更されました
tokencover.settings.button-issue.Label: 問題を報告
tokencover.settings.submenu.Label: GM遮蔽設定
tokencover.settings.submenu.title: Alternative Token Cover Settings
tokencover.DrawingConfiguration.isHole.H: For area algorithms, treat the space indicated by the drawing (including elevation) as a hole for tiles. Only applicable when Levels is active.
tokencover.dnd5e.feats.cover.Name: Ignore certain levels of cover
tokencover.dnd5e.feats.cover.Hint: Provided by feats and magic items.
tokencover.template.settings-config.view: Settings relevant to the token viewing/targeting another token that may have cover
tokencover.template.settings-config.targ: Settings relevant to the targeted token (the one for which cover would be applied).
tokencover.template.settings-config.work: Settings to adjust how cover is determined during token movement and combat.
tokencover.template.settings-config.othe: Settings to adjust other cover rules and to set system-specific cover properties.
tokencover.tokenconfig.maximum-cover.hin: Maximum cover provided by this token. Example: A swarm of bees might only provide half cover. A ghost may provide no cover. Does nothing if tokens do not grant cover (see module settings).
tokencover.cover-rules-config.title: Alt. Token Cover: Cover Rules
tokencover.cover-effects-menu.listCoverT: 遮蔽タイプ一覧（高度編集）
tokencover.active-effect-config.coverTyp: Associate this active effect with one or more specific cover types. Depending on module settings, this may cause the active effect to be automatically assigned to a token locally for a given user.
tokencover.cover-types-list-config.title: 遮蔽タイプ
tokencover.cover-types-list-config.descr: A cover type defines specific properties used to control when cover applies.
tokencover.cover-types-list-config.impor: 遮蔽タイプインポート
tokencover.cover-types-list-config.expor: 遮蔽タイプエクスポート
